column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Crowd member says : " I see him !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh no !
#Text=Who will help us ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I will .
#Text=With my airbending skills !
#Text=" Mako says : " Ah !
#Text=Hey !
#Text=Let me go !
#Text=This is not what we rehearsed !
#Text=Korra !
#Text=" Bolin says : " With the power of airbending , even this beast can float !
#Text=Like a feather .
#Text=Look what can be done in only a few short weeks of practice !
#Text=" Bolin says : " No no , do n't worry folks .
#Text=She might be young , but she is in full control !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Ladies and gentlemen , if you , or anyone you know is an airbender , please , send them our way !
#Text=Master Tenzin and Avatar Korra would love to teach them all they know !
#Text=" Kai says : " Hey !
#Text=Hello .
#Text=If you 're looking for airbenders , you just found one .
#Text=" Kai says : " I wan na join you guys .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Get outta town !
#Text=" Korra says : " We got our first recruit .
#Text=Just to be totally clear , we 're going to be heading to Ba Sing Se , then the Northern Air Temple to live as nomads and rebuild the Air Nation .
#Text=All that sound good to you ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Yeah , Ba Sing Se , rebuild the temple , Air Nomad what - do - you - do , I 'm in .
#Text=Let 's go right now .
#Text=" Bolin says : " This is going to be so great !
#Text=You going to love it , er ... ah ... real quick , what 's your name ?
#Text=" Kai says : " Kai .
#Text=So when do we hit the road ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Hang on a second Kai , where are your parents ?
#Text=We ca n't have you come with us without their permission .
#Text=" Kai says : " My parents are ... gone .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You 're an orphan ?
#Text=" Kai says : " It happened about a year ago .
#Text=My home town was raided by outlaws , but my parents fought back against them .
#Text=I was so scared , but they told me not to worry they would protect me , and they did .
#Text=My parents saved me and the entire village , but they died in the fight .
#Text=Mum and pap meant everything to me , they 're were my whole life .
#Text=Ever since then , I 've been on the run .
#Text=Those same outlaws are still after me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well , you do n't have to be on the run anymore , right guys ?
#Text=Tell him .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'm so sorry about your parents .
#Text=I know we could never replace them ... but we are here for you .
#Text=" Korra says : " We 'll keep you safe , come on .
#Text=" Bolin says : " When you board this airship , you 're going to leave your old life behind and start a new path .
#Text=That 's big brother advice .
#Text=Just think of me as your big brother .
#Text=" Mako says : " Guys !
#Text=I think we got trouble .
#Text=" Earth Kingdom sheriff says : " Release the boy , or we 'll take him by force .
#Text=" Kai says : " The outlaws !
#Text=They 're here ... Uh , let 's get out of here .
#Text=" Korra says : " We are not running away from anyone .
#Text=" Korra says : " If you want Kai , you 'll have to go through me !
#Text=" Korra says : " Your days of harassing an innocent boy is over .
#Text=You outlaws are going to prison .
#Text=" Earth Kingdom sheriff says : " Outlaws ?
#Text=Innocent boy ?
#Text=I 'm a sheriff and these are my deputies , and this kid is a thief .
#Text=Whatever he told you was a lie , we 've been chasing him for months .
#Text=" Korra says : " Where 's Kai ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Right here , I found him slipping away .
#Text=" Kai says : " I was just going to the bathroom .
#Text=" Mako says : " With your stash of gold ?
#Text=" Kai says : " I told you , I found this on the road .
#Text=" Mako says : " Enough with the lies kid .
#Text=I want the truth .
#Text=" Earth Kingdom sheriff says : " The truth is , he 's the outlaw .
#Text=He spent an entire life in an orphanage , got adopted by a real nice family six months ago , and how did he repay them ?
#Text=By taking their entire life savings .
#Text=We 've been after him ever since .
#Text=" Korra says : " Is that true ?
#Text=" Kai says : " The person who stole that stuff was the old me .
#Text=Once I got airbending , I changed .
#Text=I do n't know how to explain it , but I feel like airbending choose me for a reason , like I 'm a new person .
#Text=I 'm sorry !
#Text=Please , you have to listen to me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Are , are you taking him back to the orphanage ?
#Text=" Earth Kingdom sheriff says : " No , he 's headed to jail .
#Text=" Korra says : " Wait !
#Text=You 've got the family 's life savings , now let us take Kai .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Do you really want our first member of the Air Nation to be a liar and a thief ?
#Text=" Korra says : " He just needs some guidance , Tenzin .
#Text=Who better to give it to him than us ?
#Text=" Earth Kingdom sheriff says : " Do you want this boy or not ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Yes , you can release the boy into our custody .
#Text=" Kai says : " Thank you !
#Text=" Korra says : " Do n't make me regret it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Welcome to the family , little bro .
#Text="
